subcategory.name: Category Filters
subcategory.description: Ecommerce category filter examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS category filter components to allow customers to refine their product searches by attributes such as color, size, price range, or brand, to help them find exactly what they need. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
